Control Name: 5.9.5 This workload has a security containment strategy that blends existing on-premises security controls and practices with native security controls available in Azure, and uses a zero-trust approach.
Control Statement: Assume breach is the recommended cybersecurity mindset and the ability to contain an attacker is vital to protect information systems.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.9 How have you secured the network of your workload?
